alert.note: Alert for Bedford; Blair; Huntingdon; Mifflin (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 31 at 3:14PM EDT until March 31 at 3:45PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: The National Weather Service in State College PA has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Bedford County in south central Pennsylvania... Southeastern Blair County in central Pennsylvania... Central Huntingdon County in central Pennsylvania... Southwestern Mifflin County in central Pennsylvania... * Until 345 PM EDT. * At 313 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Whipple Dam State Park to Raystown Dam to Dudley, moving northeast at 65 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Lewistown, Huntingdon, Mount Union, Belleville, Highland Park, Strodes Mills, Allensville, Dudley, Whipple Dam State Park, Raystown Dam, Entriken and Mcalevys Fort. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Very heavy rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
